hero_description: Portal Master is a state-of-the-art software solution for easily creating and managing all of your organization's web portals.
about_title: A Technology Shaping Your Digital Future
about_f1_subtitle_1: A single platform for multiple portals
about_f1_desc_1: Portal Master enables the centralized design and management of a large number of portals. Organizations can quickly and effortlessly launch separate portals for individual stores, local offices, schools, colleges, municipalities, etc., in their network.
about_f1_desc_2: Hosting of all portals is included, thus cutting operational expenses. Additionally, for clients who do not wish to use their own domains, we can offer subdomains for each individual portal.
about_f2_desc_1: An intuitive interface facilitates content management and information access.
about_f2_desc_2: We offer technical support as well as training so that our clients can exploit the full potential of the platform.
about_f2_desc_3: Whether you are a public institution or private sector organization, Portal Master provides features tailored to meet your specific needs.
about_f3_desc_1: All accounts, data, and activities are strictly monitored, ensuring a high level of operational security.
about_f3_desc_2: The platform can be integrated with existing authentication services, yielding an additional level of data protection and minimizing the risk of unauthorized access.
about_f3_desc_3: Portal administrators no longer need to worry about regular software library updates, compliance with the latest standards, or continuous protection improvements. Our team of experts maintains all of the portals, ensuring the highest levels of security and stability.
about_f4_desc_1: Manage content, structure, and user accounts through a single interface, while allowing each portal to be customized to meet the specific needs of its users.
about_f4_desc_2: All of your portals are automatically updated with the latest features, eliminating the need for additional technical alterations.
about_f4_desc_3: Administrators can seamlessly add pages, configure menus and embed components such as news, notifications, calendars, or forms — without requiring technical skills.
about_f5_desc_1: Detailed reports provide valuable insights into portal metrics, including favourite pages, access frequency, and the most utilized features.
about_f5_desc_2: Integrated analytics tools empower data-driven strategic decisions-making, enabling content optimization and more efficient organization.
about_f6_desc_1: Create professionally designed  and visually consistent portals, fully tailored to your brand and the unique needs of your organization.
about_f6_desc_2: Support for multiple languages, automatic content adjusment tools and readability enhancements, such as inverted themes, ensure that the created portals will be inclusive and accessible to all.
func_title: Less administration so that you can focus on the essence of your business
func_desc: Portal Master represents a centralized, secure and fully customizable solution designed to simplify administration so that clients can focus on achieving their goals.
func_1_desc: Centralized customer communication management facilitates the tracking of queries, sending of notifications and personalized interaction for all portals in your network.
func_2_desc: Disseminate various notifications, documents or instructions with just one click, and track who has received and read the content.
func_3_desc: Common content is created in one location and automatically propagated to all of the portals, while also allowing for personalized adaptations.
func_4_desc: Create, edit and manage user accounts, while supporting integration with external authentication systems.
func_5_desc: A selection of themes and templates is offered but you can also customize the colors, logos and appearance of each portal.
func_6_desc: Create types of pages: news, image galleries, documents and many more - no technical skills needed.
func_7_desc: Integrated support for multiple languages, with automatic conversion between Cyrillic and Latin alphabets.
func_8_desc: Search the content of the entire portal network at once, with advanced filters like categories, keywords or time ranges.
faq_title: Everything you need to know about portals...
faq_q1: What is Portal Master and what does it offer?
faq_a1: Portal Master is a platform that streamlines the creation of web presentations and management of independent, but similar portals. Our platform represents a unique solution that enables quick creation of personalized websites, easy maintenance and efficient management. Whether you are a public institution (e.g. educational institution) or company (e.g. retail outlet).
faq_a2: No, Portal Master was envisaged to support easy content management regardless of your technical skills. The platform provides an intuitive interface and offers an assortment of templates and components, making it easy to use.
faq_q3: Can the platform be adapted to our specific needs?
faq_a3: Yes, Portal Master can be customized to meet the specific needs of your organization. Our team works closely with our clients to ensure that our platform fully supports their requirements and business processes.
faq_a4: The portals are updated automatically, through a centralized system, which ensures that you always have access to the latest functionalities and maximum security, without the need for technical intervention on your part.
faq_q5: Can it be integrated with our existing systems?
faq_a5: Yes, Portal Master can support integration with the existing systems that are significant for your business.
faq_q6: How do you guarantee data security?
faq_a6: The platform ensures data protection by using state-of-the-art security protocols, such as encryption, access control and regular security system updates. This ensures a high level of protection and reliability.
faq_q7: What type of client support is available?
faq_a7: We provide comprehensive client support, including technical assistance, training and detailed documentation, to help you get the most out of the platform.
faq_a8: The cost of hosting for all of your portals is included in the price, which eliminates additional operational expenses for the organization. Also, for clients who do not wish to use their own domains, we can create subdomains for each specific portal.
faq_q9: How can I get more information about the platform?
footer_subtitle: Your partner on your path to a digital future.
footer_description: Don’t wait for the future to come to you – step into it with us! Contact us today and discover how our platform can transform your business. Schedule a free demo and see for yourself why we’re the right choice for your success.
footer_phrase: A portal just a click away – easy, secure, and efficient.
